requirements: Prerequisites: HNDI 540, and submission of a detailed project proposal and its approval by the language studies coordinator.
description:
For students with advanced Hindi language skills who wish to engage in concentrated reading and research on material not otherwise offered by the department. The work must be supervised by an adviser and must terminate in a term paper or its equivalent.
Prerequisites: HNDI 540, and submission of a detailed project proposal and its approval by the language studies coordinator.
title: Advanced Tutorial
